UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Romo1-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide Is a New Antimicrobial Agent Against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria in a Murine Model of Sepsis.
Literature.Author: Lee HR, You DG, Kim HK, Sohn JW, Kim MJ, Park JK, Lee GY, Yoo YD

Literature.Title: A Novel Peptide Derived from the Transmembrane Domain of Romo1 Is a Promising Candidate for Sepsis Treatment and Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: You D-G, Lee H-R, Kim H-K, Lee G-Y, Yoo Y-D

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:20% Killing=256 µg/ml,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:20% Killing=256 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:30% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Human leukocytes:9% Cytotoxicity=256 µg/ml,Mouse leukocytes:5% Cytotoxicity=256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=100µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(20-30% Killing=256µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=90µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MBC=85µg/ml),Streptomyces sindenensis ATCC 12392(MBC=95µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 19433(MBC=85µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae NCCP 14585(MBC=100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=85µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MBC=100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MBC=90µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MBC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=110µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=110µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCCP 15872(MBC=120µg/ml),Enterococcus  faecium NCCP 11522(MBC=100µg/ml)
